name: 林彥良
objective:
本課程目的在提升學生溝通表達能力，並著重於創業思維與專業英文。從專業英語文學習及創業的角度，讓學生了解流程與架構並實際演練，藉此提升學生學習及未來工作所需要之英文能力。
This course aims to enhance communicative competence with special emphasis on entrepreneurial thinking and professional English skills. From the perspectives of learning English for specific purposes (ESP) and entrepreneurship, students will learn how to create, rehearse and effectively participate in a range of different scenarios for current academic and future career pursuits.
schedule:
W1-2 Making Small Talk
W3-4 Communicating effectively
W5-6 Launching a Product
W7-8 Entrepreneurial Thinking
W9-10 Being an Entrepreneur
W11-12 Marketing for Success
W13-14 Creative Thinking in Business
W15-16 Corporate Social Responsibility
W17 Career Development
W18 Project Presentation
scorePolicy:
Midterm & Final 30%
Project Presentation 25% 
Quizzes 15%
Participation, In-class Tasks & Assignments 10%
Joint Exam 20%
materials: Selected materials for innovation and entrepreneurship
